reviews.review: This game is a downgrade from Half Life 1 in almost every way. I don't understand why it's so popular. Less enemy variety, repetitive level design without the uniqueness and design of HL1, flow of combat is nowhere near as good, doesn't do enough to keep it fresh throughout the runtime. I get that it was revolutionary at the time for the physics, but it has not ages well. It's very boring and you'll just want to go back and play HL1 again.

best first person shooter ever made, I remember playing this when it came out, somewhat I was in doubt if it was going to be good or not but how mistaken I was to be in doubt, it ended up being great, no, outstanding, beyond great!!!
